Tony Stark: As a genius inventor and entrepreneur, Tony Stark, also known as Iron Man, has a unique perspective on problem-solving and a remarkable ability to turn ideas into reality. Swapping lives with him would allow me to experience the world from a technological and entrepreneurial viewpoint.

Hermione Granger: Hermione is known for her intelligence, resourcefulness, and determination. Swapping lives with her would allow me to experience the world through the eyes of a smart and driven individual who is always striving to make a difference.
